column2:
"All set? You're getting
transported right in front of
Dark Falz Elder. Hang tight."

"/face6 ...Guess we really cut that thing down to size.
Be strong. Remember all your
training. Come back to us safely. I believe in you."

"Dark Falz Elder has appeared, but
compared to before, his power is
enormous. It's likely that he will
continue getting stronger...
However, if all ARKS work together to
combine our strength, we can drive
him back! All ARKS, prepare for battle!
――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Time limit expires,
Be defeated in the final area."
